text: Speyer may refer to: == Places == * Speyer, a city in Germany == People == * The Speyer family, a prominent Jewish family of German descent * Chris Speyer (ice hockey) (1902–1966), Canadian hockey player * Chris Speyer (politician) (born 1941), Canadian politician, Member of Parliament from 1979 to 1988 == See also == *Speier *Spier, a town in the Netherlands *Spire (disambiguation) *Spires (disambiguation) *Speer (disambiguation)
title: Speyer (disambiguation)
